channel.title: Cody Zanga's Sports Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Cody Zanga's Sports Blog

item.title: About
item.description: I’m currently a senior at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. I’ll be graduating this fall with a major in sports media and communication with a minor in statistics. I’m originally from Renton, Wash. and grew up a fan of all the Seattle sports teams. I plan on analyzing data on all sorts of different sports and teams, but especially my Seattle Mariners.

item.title: Mariners to the playoffs.
item.description: This is my cool blog post about the Mariners
